object_name.value: Validate document is not associated with an inactive non-clinical study

title.value: Used to prevent documents from being made 'Effective' while the relevant Non-Clinical Study Registration Form is in a 'frozen' state (i.e. 'Inactive').

repeating.value: OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Submission Storage and Viewing
OpenText Life Sciences Research and Development Solution

This document cannot be made ''Effective/Final'' at this time, because it relates to a study that is registered as 'Inactive'. If necessary, you should contact the relevant Non-Clinical Study Manager(s) to request that the study is re-activated, so you can make this document ''Effective/Final''.
cd_non_clinical_study_info where nc_study_num=(select nc_study_num from cd_non_clinical(all) where r_object_id='$value(r_object_id)') and a_status= 'Inactive'
